titles.title: Katrina Economic Opportunity Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives for Hurricane Katrina recovery in the Gulf Opportunity Zone.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/6/2005--Introduced. Katrina Economic Opportunity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) exclude from gross income gain from the sale or exchange of a Gulf Opportunity Zone asset (business stock, partnership interest, or property in a Hurricane Katrina disaster area) held for more than five years; (2) waive small business asset expensing limits for Gulf Opportunity Zone assets; and (3) qualify Gulf Opportunity Zone investments for the new markets tax credit.
